text: あのミサトさんは / 後片付け / 責任者は責任取るためにいるからな
translation: What about Misato? / She's cleaning up the mess. / The person in charge exists to take responsibility.
grammar: ~ためにいる - exists for the purpose of (indicating someone's role or purpose)

text: 関係各省からの抗議文と被害報告書 / で、これがUNからの請求書
translation: Letters of protest from various ministries and damage reports. / And this is the bill from the UN.
grammar: ~からの - from (indicating source/origin of documents)

text: 広報部からの苦情もあるわよ / ちゃんと目通しといてね
translation: There's also a complaint from the PR department. / Make sure you read through them properly.

vocabulary.meaning: to look over, to read through

grammar: ~といてね - make sure to do~ (casual request using ~ておく in casual form)

text: 読まなくても分かってるわよ / 喧嘩をするならここでやれって言うんでしょ / ごめん、サッツ / 言われなくったって / 使徒が片付けばここでやるわよ
translation: I know even without reading them. / They're saying if we're going to fight, do it here, right? / Sorry, Ritsuko. / Even without being told... / Once the Angel is taken care of, we'll do it here.

vocabulary.meaning: to tidy up, to finish, to deal with

grammar: ~なくても - even without doing~; ~なくったって - casual form of ~なくても (even without); ~ば - conditional if/when

text: 使徒は必ず私が倒すわ / 副司令官はカンカンよ / 今度恥かかせたらさせんね間違いなく
translation: I will definitely defeat the Angel. / The Vice Commander is furious. / If you embarrass him again next time, you'll be fired for sure.
grammar: ~たら - conditional if/when; させんね likely means 左遷 (demotion/reassignment)

text: 怒り主連が留守だったのは不幸中の幸いだったけどさ / いたら即刻首よこれを見ることもなくね
translation: It was a blessing in disguise that the Commander was away. / If he had been here, you'd have been fired immediately without even seeing this.

vocabulary.reading: ふこうちゅうのさいわい

grammar: ~たら - conditional if; ~こともなく - without even doing~

text: で私の首が繋がるアイディア持ってきてくれたんでしょ / 一つだけね
translation: So you brought me an idea to save my neck, right? / Just one.

vocabulary.meaning: to keep one's job, to save one's neck

grammar: ~てくれたんでしょ - you did~ for me, right? (seeking confirmation); だけ - only, just

text: さすが限りつか博士持つべきも / のは心優しき給油ね
translation: As expected of Dr. Akagi. What one should have is... / a kind-hearted friend.
grammar: 持つべきものは~ - what one should have is~; ~き - classical attributive form creating poetic/formal tone

text: 残念ながら給油のピンチを救うのは私じゃないわ
translation: Unfortunately, I'm not the one who will save you from this crisis.
grammar: ~のは私じゃない - it's not me who~ (contrasting emphasis using のは)

text: このアイディアはカジ君よ / カジノ?
translation: This idea is from Kaji. / Kaji?
grammar: ~は~よ - topic marker with explanatory よ for emphasis

text: ただいまーって言ったって誰もいないか
translation: Even if I say 'I'm home,' there's no one here anyway.
grammar: ~って言ったって - even if I say~; ~か - rhetorical question marker (confirming to oneself)

text: な、なんだこれ / 失礼ね、あたしの荷物よ
translation: Wh-what is this? / How rude! It's my luggage.
grammar: なんだこれ - what is this? (masculine casual); 失礼ね - how rude! (ね adds indignation)

text: ん、なんだソウリュウがここにいるんだよ / あんたこそまだいたの / まだって
translation: Huh, why is Soryu here? / What about you? You're still here? / 'Still'?
grammar: なんで~んだ - why is it that~; あんたこそ - you're the one (emphatic reversal); まだって - repeating with surprise/questioning

text: あんた今日からお払い箱よ / え? / あ
translation: As of today, you're getting the boot. / Huh? / Ah...
grammar: ~から - from/starting from (temporal marker); お払い箱 - idiomatic expression for dismissal

text: リサトはあたしと暮らすの / まあどっちが優秀かを考えれば当然の選択よね
translation: Misato is going to live with me. / Well, considering which of us is superior, it's a natural choice.

vocabulary.meaning: to live, to make a living

grammar: ~を考えれば - if you consider~; ~の - explanatory の (that's how it is)

text: 本当はカジさんと一緒の方がいいんだけど / しかしどうして日本の部屋ってこう狭いのかしら / 荷物が半分も入らないじゃない / あ
translation: Actually I'd prefer to be with Kaji-san, but... / But why are Japanese rooms so cramped? / I can't even fit half my luggage! / Ah...
grammar: ~方がいい - it's better to~; ~って - casual quotative/topic marker; ~じゃない - negative with complaint tone

text: おまけに / どうしてこう日本人って危機感足りないのかしら / よくこんな鍵のない部屋で暮らせるわね / 信じらんない / 日本人の心情は察しと思いやりだからよ
translation: On top of that... / Why do Japanese people lack such a sense of danger? / How can you live in a room without locks like this? / Unbelievable! / It's because the Japanese mentality is about consideration and compassion.

vocabulary.meaning: on top of that, in addition

grammar: どうして~のかしら - I wonder why~; ~られる - potential form (can~); 信じらんない - contracted casual form of 信じられない

text: ミサトさん / おかえりなさい / 早速うまくやってるじゃない / 何がですか / 今度の作戦準備 / どうして
translation: Misato-san! / Welcome back. / You're already getting along well, aren't you? / Getting along with what? / Preparing for the upcoming operation. / How so?
grammar: ~てるじゃない - you're doing~, aren't you?; 何がですか - what (specifically)?

text: 第7使徒の弱点は一つ / 分離中のコアに対する2点同時の荷重攻撃 / これしかないわ
translation: The 7th Angel has one weakness. / A simultaneous two-point concentrated attack on its core during separation. / This is the only way.
grammar: ~中 - during/in the middle of; ~に対する - toward/against; これしかない - this is the only (way)

text: つまりエヴァ2体のタイミングを完璧に合わせた攻撃よ
translation: In other words, an attack with the timing of the two Evas perfectly synchronized.

vocabulary.meaning: in other words, that is to say

grammar: ~を合わせた - synchronized/matched (past participle modifying noun)

text: そのためには2人の協調完璧なユニゾーンが必要なの
translation: For that, we need perfect unison between the two of you through cooperation.

vocabulary.meaning: for that purpose, to that end

grammar: ~ためには - in order to~; explanatory の at end

text: そこであなたたちにこれから一緒に暮らしてもらうわ / えぇー
translation: So I'm going to have you two live together from now on. / Whaaaat?!
grammar: ~てもらう - to have someone do something (for speaker's benefit)

text: 嫌よ昔から男女7歳にして同金せずってね
translation: No way! There's an old saying: boys and girls should not sit together after age seven.

vocabulary.meaning: men and women, boys and girls

grammar: ~にして - at/upon (age); ~せず - classical negative form (not doing); ~ってね - you know, they say

text: 使徒は現在自己修復中第2波は6日後時間がないの / そんな無茶な
translation: The Angel is currently self-repairing. The second wave will come in 6 days. We don't have time. / That's absurd!
grammar: ~中 - in the middle of; ~後 - after (time period); 時間がない - there's no time

text: そこで無茶を可能にする方法 / 二人の完璧なユニゾーンをマスターするため / この曲に合わせた攻撃パターンを覚え込むのよ
translation: So here's a method to make the impossible possible. / To master perfect unison between you two... / You'll memorize attack patterns synchronized to this song.
grammar: ~にする - to make into; ~ため - for the purpose of; ~に合わせた - synchronized to/matched with
